languages.text: While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.
languages.original_text: While in half-cover, Astra Militarum commander gains +20% RoF for Las weapons. This bonus is doubled in full cover.

traits.locale_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

While the Astra Militarum Commander is adjacent to any ally, the Commander deals an additional +<u>10+(PER Bonus)%</u> damage to the enemies that are adjacent to the Commander's allies.
This stacks with Combined Arms.

While the Astra Militarum Commander is adjacent to any ally, the Commander deals an additional +<u>10+(PER Bonus)%</u> damage to all enemies adjacent to the Commander's allies.
This stacks with Combined Arms.

While the Astra Militarum Commander is adjacent to any ally, the Commander deals an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82}% damage to all enemies adjacent to the Commander's allies.
This stacks with Combined Arms.

While the Astra Militarum commander is adjacent to any ally, the commander deals an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all enemies adjacent to the commander's allies. This stacks with Regimental Tactics.

While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

languages.text: Когда командир Астра Милитарум находится за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичным укрытием{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} его лазерного оружия увеличивается на 20%, а когда за полным — на 40%.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

traits.locale_text: Когда командир Астра Милитарум находится за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичным укрытием{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} его лазерного оружия увеличивается на 20%, а когда за полным — на 40%.

Если на соседней клетке находится союзник, командир Астра Милитарум наносит +(10 + бонус ВОС)% урона всем противникам, находящимся на соседних клетках с союзниками командира. Суммируется с эффектом способности Совместные учения.

Если на соседней клетке находится союзник, командир Астра Милитарум наносит +{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82}% урона всем противникам, находящимся на соседних клетках с союзниками командира. Суммируется с эффектом способности Совместные учения.

Когда командир Астра Милитарум находится за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичным укрытием{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} его лазерного оружия увеличивается на 20%, а когда за полным — на 40%.

Когда командир Астра Милитарум находится за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичным укрытием{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} его лазерного оружия увеличивается на 20%, а когда за полным — на 40%.

languages.text: Ist der Astra Militarum-Commander in teilweiser {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} seiner Laser-Waffe um +20 %. In voller Deckung erhöht sie sich um +40 %.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

traits.locale_text:
Solange der Astra Militarum-Commander sich neben einem Verbündeten befindet, fügt er allen Gegnern, die an die Verbündeten des Commanders angrenzen, zusätzlich +{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82}% Schaden zu.
Dies wird mit Verbundene Waffen aufaddiert.

Ist der Astra Militarum-Commander in teilweiser {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} seiner Laser-Waffe um +20 %. In voller Deckung erhöht sie sich um +40 %.

languages.text: Tant que le commandant de l'Astra Militarum bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} partielle, la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de son arme laser augmente de +20 %. Elle augmente de +40 % si la couverture est totale.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le commandant de l'Astra Militarum bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} partielle, la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de son arme laser augmente de +20 %. Elle augmente de +40 % si la couverture est totale.

Lorsque le commandant de l'Astra Militarum est adjacent à un allié, il inflige +{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82} % de dégâts supplémentaires à tous les ennemis adjacents à ses alliés.
Cumulable avec Armes Combinées.

languages.text: 当星界军指挥官处于半身{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}中时，激光武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}提高20%。当处于全身掩体中时，加成提高至40%。
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

traits.locale_text: 当星界军指挥官处于半身{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}中时，激光武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}提高20%。当处于全身掩体中时，加成提高至40%。

当星界军指挥官与任意盟友相邻时，指挥官对该名盟友所有相邻的敌人造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82}%。
此效果可以与“联合突击”效果叠加。

languages.text: Mientras el comandante del Astra Militarum se halle tras {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} parcial, la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} de su arma láser aumenta en un +20 % (+40 % si la cobertura es completa).
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el comandante del Astra Militarum se halle tras {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} parcial, la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} de su arma láser aumenta en un +20 % (+40 % si la cobertura es completa).

Cuando el comandante del Astra Militarum está adyacente a cualquier aliado, el comandante inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82} % de daño a todos los enemigos adyacentes a los aliados del comandante.
Este efecto se acumula con Arsenal combinado.

Cuando el comandante del Astra Militarum está adyacente a cualquier aliado, el comandante inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes a los aliados del comandante. Este efecto se acumula con Tácticas de regimiento.

languages.text: 帝国防衛軍司令が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半遮蔽物{/g}にいる間、レーザー武器の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}は+20%増加し、完全遮蔽にいる場合は+40%増加する。
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is in partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, their las weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +20% and by +40% while in full cover.

traits.locale_text:
帝国防衛軍司令がいずれかの味方に隣接している間、司令は味方に隣接しているすべての敵に対するダメージが+<u>10+({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%増加する。
連携軍隊の効果と累積する。

帝国防衛軍司令がいずれかの味方に隣接している間、司令は味方に隣接しているすべての敵に対するダメージが+{uip|DamageBonus|dd8a80be418043908ce3431dbfb8ac82}%増加する。
連携軍隊の効果と累積する。

languages.text: Astra Militarum komutanı kısmi {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperdeyken{/g} kullandığı lazer silahının {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} +%20, tam siperdeyken +%40 artar.
